entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to cast spells on a spider.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: A large and magical spider that is attacking Harry.

entities.name: stone
entities.description: An object that Harry compares his spell to.

entities.name: legs
entities.description: The legs of the spider that are lifting Harry into the air.

relationships.description: Harry compares his spell to throwing a stone at the spider.
The spider has legs that are lifting Harry into the air.
